4k RESTORED SPECIAL EDITION!
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-chapter Cliffhanger!
Stars: Tom Tyler, Gloria Shea, William Desmond
Director: Ray Taylor

After inventing a revolutionary gravity-defying chemical compound called ‚ÄúContragrav,‚Äù a scientist and his daughter attend the National Air Races in Cleveland, Ohio, searching for a pilot to demonstrate the device. Bob Raymond, from the U.S. Border Patrol, is chosen, but he soon finds that the job entails more than mere flying.

metadata.Plot: After inventing an anti-gravity device called the Contragrav, scientist Thomas Edmunds and his daughter, Mary, attend the National Air Races in Cleveland, Ohio in search of a pilot to demonstrate the device and Bob Raymond, from the U.S. Border Patrol, is chosen. Unbeknownst to Edmunds and Mary, Mortimor Crome, who is the owner of the International Import and Export Company and a friend of Mary's, is actually the leader of a gang of smuggler's and is after Edmund's invention. During the demonstration at the air meet, Bob Raymond narrowly escapes death after his aircraft is sabotaged by Mortimer Crome and one of his cronies. This leads to Raymond being all-in and coming to Edmunds aid in foiling Crome's plans and ultimately defeating him, using another of Edmund's inventions, which was a superplane, called the Phantom.
metadata.Writer: Ella O'Neill, Basil Dickey, George H. Plympton
metadata.Actors: Tom Tyler, Gloria Shea, LeRoy Mason
